subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Before the Mets played the Braves in the finale of their three-game series Wednesday night at Shea, Orlando Hernández delivered news the Mets were hoping to avoid: he was still in pain.
snippet: Before the Mets played the Braves in the finale of their three-game series Wednesday night at Shea, Orlando Hernández delivered news the Mets were hoping to avoid: he was still in pain.
